First off, your boyfriend loves you, and wants you to thrive, I am certain. 

Having mental illness is exhausting, but listen to your body and respect it. Being around family is especially hard with anxiety, much less the nagging voice of depression ready to drag you down. It‚Äôs perfectly alright to bail if it won‚Äôt suit your mental health, I know it‚Äôs not always possible, but hopefully you have someone who has your back in those situations; if not try and find a support system, someone who you can talk to about how you are feeling?

Happy Birthday!! That‚Äôs powerful to have your b-day on this moon. Do your best to embrace your next chapter and be proud of who you are. You are also surrounded by a lot of energy being so close to the fires, so remember everything is heightened right now, and you may be experiencing an empathic period too. May I suggest trying to meditate (however that applies to you), take care of yourself as you would others. You are so strong, you‚Äôre a Capricorn! You got this.

Wolf Moon.  Lots of emotions right now. All about emotional RELEASE. A great AWAKENING. Focusing on the HEART chakra. 
This eclipse is about feeling the emotions that come to you, In order for the universe to set you on your spiritual path. 
Old People will emerge. Past pain and trauma might bubble up to the surface.  Bad habits might sneak back. Limiting beliefs may be present. 
Just remember to sit with your feelings, and really contemplate where, and why, they are emerging. 
But there are a lot of wonderful things that are happening. New opportunities. New awakenings. Dream messages. Spirit guides sending you what you need. 
First Cancer moon of the Decade. 
You are here at this moment, in this divine moment, for a reason. Open up to the possibilities that are being presented to you. 
Love and light all‚òÄÔ∏è
